rule: The output must include a full description of the date, including the weekday.
input: current date: today, forecast date: 2023-11-01, temperature: 15°C, day: Wednesday
evaluation:
Forecast for Wednesday, November 1, 2023:

Hold onto your hats, folks, because today we've got a brisk 15°C on the docket! 🧣✨ It's the kind of day where you might start off feeling like a penguin in the Arctic and end up like a toasty marshmallow by afternoon. 

Expect a mix of sunshine and clouds playing peek-a-boo, like they're auditioning for an abstract art piece. 🌤️🎨 It's a perfect day to rock that stylish scarf you've been meaning to wear since 2012. 

Keep an eye out for any unexpected breezes – they might try to steal your hat or, at the very least, mess up your hair just when you're trying to look fabulous. 💨🎩

So, grab your favorite hot beverage, enjoy the crisp air, and remember: today is all about layers, laughter, and a little bit of sunshine. ☕😂🌞
